name: Fandango
0:
”Alexa, Ask fandango to show movies”
”Alexa, Ask fandango to go to theaters page”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fandango
des:
The Fandango skill is an awesome companion to the Fandango app that helps you get more done faster using Alexa voice commands on your mobile device for hands-free access to Fandango movie showtimes and tickets.

You can use this skill to say:

"Alexa, ask Fandango to show movies"
"Alexa, ask Fandango for <movie name>"
"Alexa, ask Fandango to show my tickets"
 
For a reminder of what you can do with the Fandango skill, enable the skill and ask, “Alexa, ask Fandango what can I say”
 
Note: This skill is meant to be used on your phone. Try it with a pair of Echo Buds, Echo Frames, or an Alexa hands-free phone!
